Background

Extensive experience in Strategy Consulting, Web Analytics, Project Management, Marketing, and Communications, including B2B marketing, advertising, and PR. Interested in increasing opportunities to work in marketing and product strategy for digital technologies. Especially interested in ways to integrate these areas with my passion for management, entrepreneurship, and social enterprise. Strong communicator with creative experience and skill set in research, organization, and fast-paced environments. Excels in team environments (because great ideas don't happen in isolation). Bonus: Key eye for design and appreciation of aesthetic value in the art of selling ideas/products/anything.
